Name: Petroupoli Center
Description: The heart of Petroupoli, featuring shopping streets, restaurants, and cultural landmarks.

Name: Agios Dimitrios
Description: A vibrant neighborhood with a mix of residential areas, schools, and local businesses.

Name: Terpsithea
Description: A peaceful residential area with parks and family-friendly amenities.

Name: Ano Petroupoli
Description: An elevated neighborhood offering scenic views of the city and easy access to Mount Parnitha.
